author: Sammie's mom
text:
Great selection of clothes, but the website is riddled with inaccuracies and mistakes. Clothing is mis-labeled regarding size; or key measurements are mistaken. Since choosing the right size depends on measurements (sizing even for a single designer often varies significantly) measurements and sizing need to be correct and precise. 
Also, policies regarding shipping are inconsistent and frustrating.
Finally, texting the "concierge" is a joke. I'm not even sure if I have a real person because so often they do not understand what I am saying and I have to explain over and over.
title: Great selection of clothes, BUT...

author: customer
text: All of the pieces were in the expected condition except the Supreme NY Puffer. It had pen marks on the sleeve, and a pink stain on the front, so that was disappointing. Also the box it was shipped in either was tampered with by the mail service, or just really crappy. The tape was barely holding the box closed. I suggest being more honest about the quality of items regarding stains/discolorations, and better packing tape.
title: Supreme Puffer Coat had stains that were not described. :(

author: Kate
text:
Beautiful dress and I am excited to wear it. However, the condition rating of “excellent” with no signs of wear was unfortunately inaccurate. The dress has a stain near the neck, but more importantly, a button loop on one of the sleeves is ripped and will need repair. This dress probably needed a condition tag of good as it has clear signs of wear and light damage. 

I look forward to fixing these problems and wearing the dress for a summer event. I hope my future purchases will have more accurate condition ratings.
title: Beautiful dress, but inaccurate condition
